sourcesContent:
Drag contacts in group here
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; import { ContactService } from '../contact.service'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-contact-edit', templateUrl: './contact-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-edit.component.css'], }) export class ContactEditComponent implements OnInit { groupContacts: Contact[] = []; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit(form: NgForm) {} onCancel() {} onRemoveItem(index) {} }
